modName: Automatic Main Menu - Logos 3D and Songs v2
summary: Replaces the main menu dragon with 12 Logos in 3D and 12 songs that change at every boot ..
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://modskyrimpictures.altervista.org/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/Logos3D-Songs.png[/img]
[img]http://www.al-partners.com/images/ita.gif[/img]Per la guida in italiano della mod andate [url=http://modskyrimpictures.altervista.org/mod/automatic-main-menu-logos/]QUA[/url]
[youtube]Kwr4MoXSH3I[/youtube]
[color=black]_____________________________________________________________[/color]
[color=yellow]This mod replaces the main menu dragon with 12 Logos 3D and 12 songs[/color]
[size=3][color=black]------------------------------------------------------------------------>[/color][/size]

[b][size=6][color=green]Installation[/color][/size][/b]

[list]
[*] The Mod Requires Plugin for Skyrim > [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/][size=3]SKSE[/size][/url]
For skyrim 1.8.151.0 [SKSE v. 1.6.09]
For skyrim 1.9.32.0 [SKSE v. 1.6.16 or later]

[*] Extract the contents of the zipped file into your Skyrim/folder
usually [color=gray][u][steam/steamapps/common/skyrim][/u][/color] overwriting if Necessary

[*] Now Launch Skyrim by [color=#0093DD][size=3]SKSE_loader[/size][/color] to change the logo and music at every boot *
[/list]

[b][size=6][color=green]Compatible and Recommended Mods[/color][/size][/b]

[list]
[size=3][*][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M-Uqxq9DZSU]Load Screen Fan-Art[/url] [mod for loading]
[*] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52236/?]Smoking Hot Main Menu[/url]
[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8023]No Bethesda Logo In Menu[/url]
[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/100]KenMOD - Skip Bethesda intro[/url][/size]
[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28025]Automatic Main Menu - More Wallpapers HD and Songs[/url]
[/list]


[b][size=6][color=green]Information Music :[/color][/size][/b]
Folder / Songs [color=gray] go to [Data/mainmenuwallpapers][/color]

[color=navy][size=3]+[/size][/color] 001 /[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aHjpOzsQ9YI&feature=plcp] (Crystallize) [/url] by [size=3]Lindsey Stirling & Dubstep Violin[/size]
[color=navy][size=3]+[/size][/color] 002 /[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IL5K09mqwZc] (Skyrim Violin Cover) [/url] by [size=3]Jason Yang[/size]
[color=navy][size=3]+[/size][/color] 003 /[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fLlRIRT0mhc] (Skyrim REMIX) [/url] by [size=3]Levi Doron[/size]
[color=navy][size=3]+[/size][/color] 004 /[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H8zqjKiU1Ko] (Skyrim Dovahkiin Techno) [/url] by [size=3]BeetzeMusic[/size]
[color=navy][size=3]+[/size][/color] 005 /[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C8N5pPSFnjQ] (House Dawnguard Remix) [/url] by [size=3]Danny Darko[/size] ft. Dionne Lightwood
[color=navy][size=3]+[/size][/color] 006 /[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JGCsyshUU-A] (Shadows) [/url] by [size=3]Lindsey Stirling[/size]
[color=navy][size=3]+[/size][/color] 007 /[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P4Ft1IcKgDE] (Skyrim Main Theme remix) [/url] by [size=3]craftyFox[/size]
[color=navy][size=3]+[/size][/color] 008 /[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P4Ft1IcKgDE] (Skyrim Main Theme remix) [/url] by [size=3]craftyFox[/size]
[color=navy][size=3]+[/size][/color] 009 /[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C8N5pPSFnjQ] (House Dawnguard Remix) [/url] by [size=3]Danny Darko[/size] ft. Dionne Lightwood
[color=navy][size=3]+[/size][/color] 010 /[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T7tNjeVFf4Y] Sons Of Skyrim (Filterswept's Dovahkiin Remix) [/url] by [size=3] Filterswept [/size]
[color=navy][size=3]+[/size][/color] 011 /[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T7tNjeVFf4Y] Sons Of Skyrim (Filterswept's Dovahkiin Remix) [/url] by [size=3] Filterswept [/size]
[color=navy][size=3]+[/size][/color] 012 /[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T7tNjeVFf4Y] Sons Of Skyrim (Filterswept's Dovahkiin Remix) [/url] by [size=3] Filterswept [/size]


[color=navy]__________________________________________________________________________[/color]
[size=3]Audio:[/size] if by chance the volume is low edit SkyrimPrefs.ini in [Document / My Games / Skyrim]
open with Notepad and change the string:

[AudioMenu]
fAudioMasterVolume=1.0000

in

[AudioMenu]
fAudioMasterVolume=2.0000

or

[AudioMenu]
fAudioMasterVolume=4.0000

Save and Enjoy :D
[color=navy]_______________[/color]


[b][size=6]Credits:[/size][/b]
Bethesda for Skyrim
Skyrimnexus for the community website
Authors to Skse and Authors of Songs (taken from You-Tube)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1535027]hellstorm102[/url] for randomizer plugin
[color=navy]______________________________________________________________[/color]
